document_data.name: Smasheye
document_data.mainbody: '''Smasheye''' was an [[orc]] leader within the [[Burntbone Horde]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: He was able to revitalize his comrades with the strength of his vision for their future. In battle, he attacked with mighty slams of his [[mace]].
document_data.History: Smasheye was not as important as [[Vargor|Vargor the Fierce]] in the Horde's hierarchy, but unlike Vargor he survived the attack on [[Sharpstone Keep]] by [[adventurers]] from [[Waterdeep]].
